content: Hole Saw Kit Hole Saw Kits available as ready to use sets for different purposes. ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Metal, wood and other material drill bits- - - ### FEATURES:Features Available in pre-assembled kits for specific trades. Contain hole saws in a range of common diameters along with 2 different size arbors and 10 pilot bits. Plumber’s Hole Saw Kit includes the following hole saws and accessories: 1-1/8”, 1-3/8”, 1-3/4”, 2-1/4”, 3”, 4”, 3/8 Hex Arbor, 7/16 Hex Arbor, 1/4 Pilot (10/pack), Hilti Kit Box Electrician’s Hole Saw Kit includes the following hole saws and accessories: 7/8”, 1-1/8”, 1-3/8”, 1-1/2”, 2”, 2-1/2, 3/8 Hex Arbor, 7/16 Hex Arbor, 1/4 Pilot (10/pack), Hilti Kit Box Generalist’s Hole Saw Kit includes the following hole saws and accessories: 3/4”, 7/8”, 1-1/8”, 1-3/8”, 1-1/2”, 1-3/4”, 2”, 2-1/4”, 2-1/2”, 3”, 4” , 3/8 Hex Arbor, 7/16 Hex Arbor, 1/4 Pilot (10/pack), Hilti Kit Box Applications Storage and transport of Hilti hole saws, arbors, and pilot bits. Please note: Hole saws must always be used with compatible arbor and pilot bit ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material: Metal, Wood with nails, Wood, Steel, Plastic Working mode: Drilling Connection end: Hex shank Technical Data | Base material | Metal, Wood with nails, Wood, Steel, Plastic | Working mode | Drilling | Connection end | Hex shank ### ITEMS- 3817927 - ELECTRICIANS HOLE SAW KIT - Package Size 1 pc - 3817928 - PLUMBERS HOLE SAW KIT - Package Size 1 pc - 3817929 - GENERALIST HOLE SAW KIT - Package Size 1 pc
